title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. However, they have no effect on the displayed image. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they don't perform any scrolling action.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled when they have no effect on the displayed image.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.2 (GTK2 only). 
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. 
4. Open a small image, such as an icon. 
5. Notice that the scrollbars are present but do not have any effect.
